user_story.so_that: increase my investment in the co-op

whens_list: I go to the Shares page
I enter the number of additional shares I want
thens_list: I should see the payment that will be required
I should see that a payment is required for my new shares
the Secretary should receive a notification of the new share application

whens_list: I go to the Shares page
I enter a number of additional shares that would take me over the maximum legal shareholding
thens_list: I should see a message telling me that I cannot apply for this number of shares
I should not be able to press "Apply for more shares"
